title: Remove Morgana from the game
body: Even if you play vs bots if you get hit by her Q you're dead. I mean you can dodge it as much times as you want but if you get hit once it's gg. And it's just a basic ability.

replies.body: These days, almost any CC means death.

In this case also remove Ahri, Thresh, Blitzcrank, Pyke, Sejuani, Leona, Nautilus, Malzahar, Lissandra, Veigar, Shen, Galio, Cho'Gath, Sion, Swain, Annie, Taric, Zilean, Ryze, Warwick, Riven, Kennen, Skarner, Elise.

Surely we don't need them

> [{quoted}](name=Mileena Is Dead,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oxc1k0Ks,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-06-28T10:05:41.261+0000)
>
> In this case also remove Ahri, Thresh, Blitzcrank, Pyke, Sejuani, Leona, Nautilus, Malzahar, Lissandra, Veigar, Shen, Galio, Cho'Gath, Sion, Swain, Annie, Taric, Zilean, Ryze, Warwick, Riven, Kennen, Skarner, Elise.
> 
> Surely we don't need them

How could you, you forgot the most important one here....{{champion:142}} is not amused

> [{quoted}](name=Mileena Is Dead,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oxc1k0Ks,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-06-28T10:05:41.261+0000)
>
> In this case also remove Ahri, Thresh, Blitzcrank, Pyke, Sejuani, Leona, Nautilus, Malzahar, Lissandra, Veigar, Shen, Galio, Cho'Gath, Sion, Swain, Annie, Taric, Zilean, Ryze, Warwick, Riven, Kennen, Skarner, Elise.
> 
> Surely we don't need them

i disagree, esp for ahri because her E is not hard cc early game, unless she is maxing E first
You probably just got stomped on by a skilled Morgana. Getting hit by her Q doesn't mean instant death, especially considering how slow and therefore dodgeable it is.

Dude, she died when that stupid redesign hit.

But, other than that, why are you people waking up now? She remained the same for the majority of her time in League, and nobody had a problem with this. 

Besides, Q isn't her strongest basic skill. Black Shield is the real playmaker for her.
